thread.title: The Four Points and Coke Zero Ultimate Fan Experience
thread.title_full: The Four Points and Coke Zero Ultimate Fan Experience

title: The Four Points and Coke Zero Ultimate Fan Experience
text:
The Four Points and Coke Zero Ultimate Fan Experience Where 
9:00 a.m. Saturday, Oct. 24, 2015 Categories 
Events, Food | Wine, On Campus | Alumni Celebrate college football season like never before at the Four Points + Coke Zero Ultimate Fan Experience Tailgate series, kicking off at the Utah Utes vs USC Trojans game on Saturday, October 24th. Show your school spirit, and cheer on your favorite team – as well as your local BBQ joints – during this one-of-a-kind game day celebration. The event is free and open to the public and highlights include: an RV karaoke bus where fans can hop aboard and belt out their all-time favorite sports anthems; a mouth-watering menu by Four Points + Coke Zero Ultimate Tailgate Grill Master Chef Elizabeth Karmel; games like cornhole where fans can win cool swag and prizes; and a Side Dish Showdown where fans will vote for their favorite dish from local restaurants. The winner will have their recipe featured on the Food page of the official Coca-Cola website, win free Four Points hotel stays and - most importantly - have unlimited bragging rights!
